text: The 2018 Big East Women's Basketball Tournament ended the 2017–18 season of Big East Conference women's basketball. The event was held March 3–6, 2018 at Wintrust Arena in Chicago.2018 Big East Women's Basketball Tournament Big East regular-season co-champion and tournament host DePaul won the tournament and with it the Big East's automatic bid to the 2018 NCAA Division I Women's Basketball Tournament. ==Seeds== {| class="wikitable" style="white- space:nowrap; font-size:90%;" |- | colspan="10" style="text-align:center; background:#DDDDDD; font:#000000" | 2018 Big East Women's Basketball Tournament seeds and results |- bgcolor="#efefef" ! Seed ! School ! Conf. ! Over. ! Overall records include all games played in the Big East Tournament. |} ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%" |- align="center" !Game !Time* !Matchup# !Television !Attendance |- !colspan=5| First Round – Saturday, March 3 |- |1 |4:00 PM |#9 Providence vs. #8 Butler |rowspan=2|BEDN |rowspan=2|1,950 |- |2 |6:30 PM |#10 Xavier vs. #7 Seton Hall |- !colspan=6| Quarterfinals – Sunday, March 4 |- |3 |12:00 PM |#1 Marquette vs. #8 Butler |rowspan=4|FS2 |rowspan=2|1,991 |- |4 |2:30 PM |#4 Creighton vs. #5 St John's |- |5 |6:00 PM |#2 DePaul vs. #7 Seton Hall |rowspan=2|2,147 |- |6 |8:30 PM |#3 Villanova vs. #6 Georgetown |- !colspan=6| Semifinals – Monday, March 5 |- |7 |3:00 PM |#1 Marquette vs. #4 Creighton |rowspan=2|FS1 |rowspan=2|2,192 |- |8 |5:30 PM |#2 DePaul vs. #6 Georgetown |- !colspan=6| Championship – Tuesday, March 6 |- |9 |6:00 PM |#1 Marquette vs. #2 DePaul |FS1 |2,264 |- |colspan=6| *Game Times in CT. #-Rankings denote tournament seed |} Source: ==Bracket== * denotes overtime period ==See also== * 2018 Big East Men's Basketball Tournament ==References== ==External links== *Big East website * Category:Big East Women's Basketball Tournament Category:Basketball in Chicago Category:2010s in Chicago Big East Tournament
